mapper.select:
SELECT t.id, login_name, t.name, password, sex, age, user_type, t.status, organization_id, t.create_time, phone, s.name AS organizationName, o.id AS roleId, o.name AS roleName FROM C_USER t LEFT JOIN C_USER_role r ON t.id = r.user_id LEFT JOIN c_role o ON r.role_id = o.id LEFT JOIN c_organization s ON s.id = t.organization_id
t.id = #{id}
